Text: More info on this classic western at: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0048691/
I'm looking for a very old classic with Jane Russell called The French Line was wondering if you could help me please?

@Littered29732, This one is pretty rare and no DVD release yet. Youtube has some postings of the film, and Amazon sells the VHS copy. I am afraid the best thing is to wait for a studio print release on DVD? Jane Russel is great and I wish I could find a decent copy of this one also!
